title: Hit-and-run that killed 4 believed to be planned Islamophobic attack, Canadian police say
content:
1. Hit-and-run that killed 4 believed to be planned Islamophobic attack, Canadian police say  NBC News
  2. Police say a driver who hit and killed 4 pedestrians in Ontario targeted them because they were Muslim  Yahoo News
  3. Muslim family killed in 'premeditated' truck attack  BBC News
  4. Muslim community reacts in horror after 4 killed in what police call 'premeditated' hit-and-run  CTV News
  5. Canadian police say family run down targeted as Muslims  Devdiscourse
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 4人が死亡した轢き逃げ事件は、イスラム恐怖症を狙った計画的な攻撃と思われる、とカナダの警察が発表。
加拿大警方表示，造成4人死亡的肇事逃逸事件被认为是有计划的仇视伊斯兰教的攻击行为
加拿大警方表示，造成4人死亡的肇事逃逸事件被認爲是有計劃的仇視伊斯蘭教的攻擊行爲
